verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is this woman Where does she come from, who can she be The garments she wears None can compare to her beauty She’s also radiant, fragrant with eternity{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, she is called ecclesia She is the woman God had dreamed of She is the church, She is the bride The New Jerusalem, God’s wife (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For she came out of His side She’s ecclesia Oh, she came out of His side His ecclesia For she’s the city of God She’s ecclesia Oh, She’s the city of God His ecclesia{/lang-eng}
